result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ella D Ferguson

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on November 9, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

10:36 AM Defendant Ella D Ferguson in court.  Prosecuting attorney Cheniqua White in court for the State of Wisconsin. Sworn testimony by Ella Ferguson. Defendant waives right to counsel freely and voluntarily in open court, court accepts waiver.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Status hearing on October 21, 2022 at 10:15 am.

10:28 AM Margaret Ginocchio appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Ella Ferguson appeared by audio. Court finds defendant standing mute and enters not guilty plea on her behalf. Remand to branch 2 for scheduling.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 11, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Activity: initial appearance
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

10:40 AM Prosecuting attorney Noah M Tylenda appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ella D Ferguson appeared by phone. Court orders warrant recalled. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Signature bond set of $250.00   with conditions. Must sign bond by end of day on August 5, 2022. Matter continued to allow defendant time to obtain an attorney. Adjourned initial appearance August 11, 2022 at 10:00 am.

11:20 AM Prosecuting attorney David S Olson and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ella D Ferguson not in court. Bench warrant ordered on defendants nonappearance. Cash bond of $200 set. Reviewable by Court Commissioner.
Initial appearance on July 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.
